mapper.select: SELECT p.*,p.id pid,pc1.name pc1name ,pc2.name pc2name ,pc3.name pc3name FROM tb_product p, tb_product_category pc1, tb_product_category pc2, tb_product_category pc3 WHERE p.categoryLevel1Id=pc1.id AND p.categoryLevel2Id=pc2.id AND p.categoryLevel3Id=pc3.id AND p.id=#{id}
mapper.insert: insert into tb_product (name, description, price, placement, stock, categoryLevel1Id, categoryLevel2Id, categoryLevel3Id, fileName, isDelete, createdBy, creationDate) values (#{name}, #{description}, #{price}, #{placement}, #{stock}, #{categoryLevel1Id}, #{categoryLevel2Id}, #{categoryLevel3Id}, #{fileName}, #{isDelete}, #{createdBy}, #{creationDate})
mapper.update:
